document_data.name: Consequence
document_data.mainbody: '''''Consequence''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[spell]] from the [[Numbers sphere|numbers]] and [[divination sphere]]s that allowed the caster to determine the future consequences of a recent event.
document_data.Effects: The caster could use this spell to determine the effect on a grand scheme by a recent event. Information such as whether or not major or minor implications would occur as a result of the event could be gleamed. Casting the spell twice within a full day would reveal the same results.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[Somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required as a [[material component]] some [[platinum]] coins or dice which were cast during the casting. The coins or dice needed to be worth at least 1,000 [[gp]] and were not consumed during the casting.
document_data.History: This spell was favored by [[holy strategist]]s of the [[Red Knight]].
